query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
1 Parea dinanzi a me con l’ali aperte 2 la bella image che nel dolce frui 3 liete facevan l’anime conserte;
query.error: **English:** 1 Appeared before me with wings outspread 2 the lovely image that in sweet enjoyment 3 made the souls joined together joyful;

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
4 parea ciascuna rubinetto in cui 5 raggio di sole ardesse sì acceso, 6 che ne’ miei occhi rifrangesse lui.
query.error: **English:** 4 each one seemed a ruby in which 5 a ray of the sun burned so brightly 6 that it was reflected in my eyes.
query.result: 4 Ekaikaḥ maṇiratna iva ābhāsate yasmin 5 Sūrya-kiraṇaḥ prakāśate tathā prakāśena 6 Yathā mama netrau tasya pratibimbam dadhāte.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
7 E quel che mi convien ritrar testeso, 8 non portò voce mai, né scrisse incostro, 9 né fu per fantasia già mai compreso;
query.error: **English:** 7 And what is fitting for me to recall of it, 8 no voice ever bore, nor ink wrote, 9 nor was it ever comprehended by fantasy;

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
10 ch’io vidi e anche udi’ parlar lo rostro, 11 e sonar ne la voce e «io» e «mio», 12 quand’ era nel concetto e ‘noi’ e ‘nostro’.
query.error: **English:** 10 for I saw and also heard the beak speak, 11 and sound in the voice both “I” and “mine”, 12 when it was in the thought both “we” and “ours”.
query.result: 10 yataḥ aham adṛkṣam api ca śṛṇomi ca vaktram bruvāṇam, 11 śabde ca “aham” iti ca “mama” iti ca dhvanitam, 12 yadā sa bhāvanāyām āsīt, “vayam” iti ca “asmākam” iti ca.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
16 e in terra lasciai la mia memoria 17 sì fatta, che le genti lì malvage 18 commendan lei, ma non seguon la storia».

query.result: 16 Pṛthivyāṃ ca mama smṛtiḥ 17 Tathāvidhā sthitā, yataḥ pāpāḥ janāḥ 18 Tām praśaṃsanti, na tu ācaraṇam kurvanti".

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.

query.result: 19 Evam ekaḥ tāpaḥ aneka-bhrājamānānām 20 jñāyate, yathā aneka-premaṇām 21 ekaḥ śabdaḥ eva niḥsṛtaḥ āsīt tasmāt mūrteḥ.

Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
28 Ben so io che, se ’n cielo altro reame 29 la divina giustizia fa suo specchio, 30 che ’l vostro non l’apprende con velame.

query.result: 28 Suṣṭhu jānāmi aham yad api svarge anyat rājyam 29 daivī nyāyaḥ karoti svakīyam darpaṇam, 30 yat tad bhavataḥ na jānanti āvaraṇena.

133 e a dare ad intender quanto è poco, 134 la sua scrittura fian lettere mozze, 135 che noteranno molto in parvo loco.
